title: Below the Belt with Brendan Schaub
resume: Comedian and former fighter Brendan Schaub hosts this first-of-its-kind digital sports talk show featuring some of the biggest names in combat sports and entertainment. Get the latest combat sports news and pop culture, delivered in Schaub's hilariously unique and unfiltered style. Released twice-monthly, episodes can be viewed on YouTube and Facebook, and the multi-platform series also includes a weekly podcast and a monthly composite program.
